name: Helda Sweis Deukmajian
text: My daughter wanted pizza so I agreed to go here.  Sadly the food looked old and the place looked dirty, but we continued to order with someone that didnt want to be there.. we waited 10 minutes for our food, and got the wrong pizza.. when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Joey Dee
text: Dirty utensil container. Poor customer service. Been waiting for my order and they already cooked and done with my order but still asked employees if i paid for it and I showed my Google Pay App that I paid. Pizza üçï was already cold when she gave it to me  Will not recommend eating at this place.

name: roger bartling
text: Great concept because everyone gets there own and its fast. also thin crust is nice so you dont feel to full just satisfied. Line can get long sometimes.

name: BLACK DIAMOND MUA
text: They close at 7pm. I arrived at 6:58pm. They would not take my order. I would not ever stop at this Blaze ever again.

name: bleep meh

name: Raquel McTarsney
text: I like that you can request what you want on your pizza so delicious

name: Maya Hamade
text: Love this place! My favorite build your own pizza spot. I like that you get as many toppings and the crust is delicious. The toppings are always fresh and the pizza comes out tasting amazing.

name: Magesh S.R
text: Awesome pizzas on the go...my kids liked it

name: Kyle W. R.
text: Amazing build your own possibilities.

name: Muhammad Usamah Rashid
text: Cheese pizza is too good.

name: Edmond Ho
text: Very similar to Pieology, though the meat lovers base pizza ended up being about roughly half the meat compared to Pieology. Still delicious nonetheless.

name: Melissa Pleasant
text: Great pizza, great price!!

name: Amanda Jahanvash
text:
The choices are outstanding! Nothing better than make your own pizza.
Love the choices for toppings. Delicious pizza. Friendly staff.
The blood orange lemonade is the best.

name: Dee Nice
text: People that work there are very friendly and quick on there feet.....best pizza in BREA.

name: Pedro Delgadillo
text: Its ok not the hungry

name: Troy Haar
text: Pizza was stale and didn't taste that good.

name: Ez Rayler
text: This place is AWESOME. The pizza is delicious and it only takes a few minutes to cook. The service is outstanding and the people are super friendly. I was not expecting to find a place like this inside a mall. This pizza is great and isn't that  stale cardboard sbarro "pizza".

name: armando ramos
text: Delicious pizza everüòöüòö

name: Maren Busacker
text: Dining room was a mess. Staff was very unfriendly and burnt my pizza, I asked for a re-fire and they practically said no to me and told me off, once I finally convinced them to remake it they just made a big scene about it and embarrassed ‚Ä¶More

name: Samantha Brookins
text: There staff is trash they stand around gossiping instead of doing there job. I had to wait unnecessarily for an order that was done because they where to busy talking.

name: Just Jack
text: Try the gluten free pizza here. You will not be  disappointed.

name: gordon rieske
text: Music was so loud I had to yell at order taker.  Ask manager to turn it down and she refused.  Said that volume level  is set by upper management and she cannot  deviate from it.  We were the only two in the place and we left.  Not sure I‚Äôll go back.
